price: Isaan sulula (oduu) hunda keessa akka seenan hin agartuu?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
